顛.definition: top (of the head); apex; to fall forwards; inverted; to jolt

顛來倒去.definition: to harp on; over and over; merely ring changes on a few terms

顛倒.definition: to turn upside down; to reverse; back to front; confused; deranged; crazy

顛倒是非.definition: (idiom) to distort right and wrong; to deliberately mislead

顛倒黑白.definition: lit. to invert black and white (idiom); to distort the truth deliberately; to misrepresent the facts; to invert right and wrong

顛兒.definition: (Beijing dialect) to skedaddle; to make oneself scarce

顛峰.definition: variant of 巔峰|巅峰[dian1 feng1]

顛沛.definition: to fall over; to stumble; (fig.) to suffer hardship; to be in desperate straits

顛沛流離.definition: homeless and miserable (idiom); to wander about in a desperate plight; to drift

顛簸.definition: to be jolted around (car on a bumpy road, boat on a rough sea, aircraft experiencing turbulence); (fig.) to undergo a rough experience

顛覆.definition: to topple (i.e. knock over); to capsize; fig. to overturn (a regime, by plotting or subversion); to undermine; to subvert

顛覆國家罪.definition: crime of incitement to overthrow the state; abbr. for 煽動顛覆國家政權|煽动颠覆国家政权[shan1 dong4 dian1 fu4 guo2 jia1 zheng4 quan2]

顛覆政府罪.definition: crime of incitement to overthrow the state; abbr. for 煽動顛覆國家政權|煽动颠覆国家政权[shan1 dong4 dian1 fu4 guo2 jia1 zheng4 quan2]

顛覆罪.definition: crime of incitement to overthrow the state; abbr. for 煽動顛覆國家政權|煽动颠覆国家政权[shan1 dong4 dian1 fu4 guo2 jia1 zheng4 quan2]

顛踣.definition: to fall down; to fall forward
